message.content:
Explore the codebase at /home/user/app thoroughly. I need to understand:
1. The overall project structure (all files and folders)
2. Contents of src/types/ directory (all type files)
3. Contents of src/services/ directory (all service files)
4. Contents of src/App.tsx or main index file
5. Contents of index.css
6. Contents of tailwind.config.ts
7. Any existing components in src/components/
8. package.json dependencies

Please read ALL these files and provide their full contents.

content.text: Perfect! Now let me check one more file - the components.json to understand the shadcn setup:

content.content:
1→{
     2→  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema.json",
